item.title: Righteous Brothers - Unchained melody
item.description:
Oh my love
my darling
I’ve hungered for
your touch along
Lonely time
And Time goes by
So slowly
and time can do
So much Are you
still mine
I need your love
I need your love
God speed your love
to me
Lonely rivers flow
to the sea to the sea
To the open arms
to the sea yeah
Lonely rivers sigh
wait for me
Wait for me
I’ll be coming home
Wait for me
Oh my love my darling
I’ve hungered hungered
for your touch
A long
lonely time
And Time goes
by so slowly
And time can do
so much
Are you still mine
I need your love
I I need
your love
God speed your
love to me

item.title: Righteous Brothers - Ebb Tide
item.description:
First the tide
rushes in-
plants a kiss
on the shore
Then rolls-
out to sea
and the sea
is very still once more
So I rush to your side-
like the on
coming tide with one
burning thought
will your arms
open wide?
At last we’re
face to face
And as we kiss
through an embrace
I can tell
I can feel
you are love
you are real
Really mine
in the rain
in the dark
in the sun
Like the tide
at it’s ebb-
I’m at peace in the web
of your arms–
